DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study examined the effect of task-oriented mobility training in three persons chronic post-stroke using a novel, wearable, mobile intention-based robotic orthosis (Tibion Bionic Leg).
DOC.brief_title: Mobility Training Using a Bionic Knee Orthosis in Patients Chronic Post-Stroke: A Case Series
DOC.criteria: Male or female Aged 40 to 60 years One year status poststroke Able to walk at least 10 meters Independence in selfcare Medically unstable Major cardiopulmonary deficiency Major depression Significant cognitive deficit Currently receiving gait training Younger than 40 years of age Older than 60 years of age Unable to walk at least 10 meters
